h1. Server Audit History Project Plugin

The Server Audit History Project Plugin displays the audit log from the server. server is running.  

h2. Version

Available from version 1.5

h2. Examples

{code:xml|borderStyle=solid}
<serverAuditHistoryProjectPlugin />
{code}


h2. Configuration Elements

There is no configuration for this plugin.

h2. Notes

This requires that the currently logged in user has the required permissions on the server.
